message.body: I heard last night there was a chance of snow for the Pocono area in a few days. Maybe it wouldn't be a bad idea if I bring my skis. I wouldn
't mind bringing them if there's a chance of actual snow
Did you hear about storm draco?
You should have plenty of room in your car since you are driving separately.
I heard the name but not any details.
Yeah i wanted to read more on it today
Traffic sucks.. now my eta is 7:40
Somehow I lost that glimpse. If you get a chance please resend.
